column4: bɔsoɛr egyina: na ahohiaber bɛba a ofitsi dɛ aman bɔbɔɔ adze besi ber no mu ɔmmbaa da: ber no na wɔbɛgye wo man no mu obiara a wobohu no dɛ wɔakyerɛw ne dzin wɔ nwoma no mu."

column2: "Na hɔn mu piinara a wɔadeda famu wɔ dɛtse mu no
column5: na binom akɔ enyimguase na daa sesar mu."

column3: wɔbɛhyerɛn dɛ wimu hyerɛn; na hɔn a wɔdan piinara kɔ tsenenee mu no

column5: na onkodu ewiei ber no: piinara boguan edzi akɔnaaba

column2: "Nna emi Daniel muhun dɛ mbanyin afofor beenu gyina hɔ
column3: ɔbaako wɔ esutsen no kɔn do afa kor
column4: na ɔbaako so wɔ esutsen no kɔn do afa kor."

column2: "Na ɔbaako bisaa nyimpa no a ofura ndwera no a ɔwɔ esutsen no etsifi no dɛ
column3: Ɔbɛkyɛr ekodu dabɛn ana anwanwadze yinom ewiei aba mu?"

column2: "Na metsee dɛ nyimpa a ofura ndwera no a ɔwɔ esutsen no etsifi no
column3: na ɔmaa ne nyimfa na ne bankum do kyerɛɛ sor
column4: na ɔkaa nyia ɔtse ase daa no ntam no see dɛ obodu mfe ebiasa na fa; na sɛ wowie ɔman krɔnkrɔn no n’ahoɔdzen mu bubu a

column3: na manntse ase: nna mesee dɛ

column4: kɔ wo kwan: na wɔatotow nsɛm no mu
apɔw hɔnho; na emumuyɛfo bɔkɔ do ara ayɛ emumuyɛ; na emumuyɛfo biara renntse ase: na hɔn a wɔyɛ enyansafo no na wɔbɛtse ase."

column2: "Na ofitsi ber a wobeyi daa ɔhyew afɔr no wɔ hɔ
column3: na wɔdze amamfoyɛ ekyiwadze a ɔbɔ ɔman no esi hɔ no

column2: "Osiarfo nye nyia ɔrotweɔn ekodu nda apem ahaasa eduasa enum do no."

column3: hom do araa kodu ewiei: na ebɔkɔ w’ahomgye mu
column4: na ebɔsoɛr ekenya wo kyɛfa wɔ nda no ewiei."
